Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Treatment Date
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: Enter the date of your acupuncture treatment.

Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Practitioner Name
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: Enter the name of the acupuncturist who performed the treatment.

Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Treatment Focus/Primary Complaint
Accupuncture Treatments.Common Units: Text, Dropdown (Pain Management, Stress Reduction, Digestive Issues, etc.)
Accupuncture Treatments.Common Units Full Name: Text description or selection from a predefined list
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: Describe the main reason for this acupuncture session.

Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Points Used (Optional)
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: Optionally list some of the acupuncture points that were used during the session.

Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Needle Sensation
Accupuncture Treatments.Common Units: Descriptive (e.g., dull ache, tingling, heavy, no sensation)
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: Describe the sensations you experienced upon needle insertion.

Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Relaxation Level During Treatment
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: Rate your level of relaxation during the acupuncture session.

Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Pain Level Before Treatment (if applicable)
Accupuncture Treatments.Common Units Full Name: Scale from 0 (no pain) to 10 (worst possible pain)
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: If you were experiencing pain, rate your pain level before the treatment.

Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Pain Level After Treatment (if applicable)
Accupuncture Treatments.Common Units Full Name: Scale from 0 (no pain) to 10 (worst possible pain)
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: If you were experiencing pain, rate your pain level immediately after the treatment.

Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Immediate Symptom Changes
Accupuncture Treatments.Common Units: Descriptive (e.g., felt lighter, less tense, no change)
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: Describe any immediate changes in your symptoms or how you felt right after the treatment.

Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Symptom Changes Hours Later
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: Describe any changes in your symptoms or how you felt several hours after the treatment.

Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Symptom Changes the Next Day
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: Describe any changes in your symptoms or how you felt the day after the treatment.

Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Overall Effectiveness of Treatment
Accupuncture Treatments.Common Units Full Name: Rating scale from 1 to 5 stars or 1 to 10
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: Rate the overall effectiveness of this particular acupuncture session.

Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Side Effects (if any)
Accupuncture Treatments.Common Units: Descriptive (e.g., slight bruising, fatigue, emotional release)
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: Note any side effects you experienced after the treatment.

Accupuncture Treatments.Name: Notes/Observations
Accupuncture Treatments.Entry Text: Add any other relevant notes about the treatment or your experience.

Acupuncture Areas Treatment.Name: Rationale for Point Selection (if explained)
Acupuncture Areas Treatment.Entry Text: If your practitioner explained the reasoning behind the choice of specific points, jot down the key points.

Acupuncture Areas Treatment.Name: Changes Related to Specific Areas/Channels
Acupuncture Areas Treatment.Common Units Full Name: Custom text entry or descriptive words related to specific channels or areas
Acupuncture Areas Treatment.Entry Text: Note any changes or sensations you felt along specific channels or in particular areas of your body during or after the treatment, using custom terms or descriptions.

Acupuncture Areas Treatment.Name: Overall Impression of TCM Diagnosis
Acupuncture Areas Treatment.Common Units Full Name: Custom text entry, scale, and descriptive words
Acupuncture Areas Treatment.Entry Text: Rate your understanding and agreement with the TCM diagnosis provided, or add custom notes.

Resources.Name: NIH National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health (NCCIH)
Resources.Summary: Provides evidence-based information on complementary and integrative health approaches, including acupuncture.

Resources.Name: American Academy of Medical Acupuncture (AAMA)
Resources.Summary: Professional organization for physician acupuncturists, offering research, education, and practitioner finder.

Resources.Name: PubMed Central
Resources.Summary: Database of biomedical literature; search for clinical studies and reviews on various treatments including acupuncture.

Resources.Name: Mayo Clinic - Complementary and Alternative Medicine
Resources.Summary: Patient-focused information on various CAM therapies, including potential benefits and risks.

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Date
Swimming Activity Tracking.Entry Text: Enter the date of your swim.

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Pool/Location
Swimming Activity Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Name of the pool or swimming location
Swimming Activity Tracking.Entry Text: Enter the name or type of location where you swam (e.g., YMCA, lake).

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Duration
Swimming Activity Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Total time spent swimming in minutes
Swimming Activity Tracking.Entry Text: Record the total duration of your swimming session.

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Distance
Swimming Activity Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Distance swum in meters or yards
Swimming Activity Tracking.Entry Text: Record the total distance you swam. Specify the units.

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Laps
Swimming Activity Tracking.Entry Text: Record the number of laps you swam.

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Stroke(s) Used
Swimming Activity Tracking.Common Units: Text, Dropdown (Freestyle, Backstroke, Breaststroke, Butterfly, Mixed)
Swimming Activity Tracking.Entry Text: List the swimming stroke(s) you used during your session.

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Interval Training (if applicable)
Swimming Activity Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Indicate if you did interval training and optionally describe it
Swimming Activity Tracking.Entry Text: Indicate if you incorporated interval training and optionally provide details (e.g., 4 x 50m freestyle on 1:00).

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Perceived Exertion
Swimming Activity Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Rating of Perceived Exertion on a scale of 1 to 10
Swimming Activity Tracking.Entry Text: Rate how hard the swim felt on a scale of 1 (very light) to 10 (maximal).

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Energy Level Before Swim
Swimming Activity Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Rating of your energy level before swimming
Swimming Activity Tracking.Entry Text: Rate your energy level before starting your swim.

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Energy Level After Swim
Swimming Activity Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Rating of your energy level after swimming
Swimming Activity Tracking.Entry Text: Rate your energy level after finishing your swim.

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Enjoyment Level
Swimming Activity Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Rating of how much you enjoyed the swim
Swimming Activity Tracking.Entry Text: Rate how much you enjoyed your swimming session.

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Focus/Purpose of Swim
Swimming Activity Tracking.Common Units Full Name: The main goal or focus of your swim
Swimming Activity Tracking.Entry Text: Note the primary reason for your swim (e.g., endurance, working on breaststroke technique).

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Water Temperature (Optional)
Swimming Activity Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Water temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit

Swimming Activity Tracking.Name: Notes/Observations
Swimming Activity Tracking.Entry Text: Add any other relevant notes about your swim, such as how you felt, specific drills, or observations about the environment.

Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Name: Resistance/Weight (if applicable)
Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Pounds, kilograms, or description of resistance band

Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Name: Hold Time (if applicable)
Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Entry Text: If the exercise involves holding a position, record the hold time.

Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Name: Pain Level During Exercise
Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Scale from 0 (no pain) to 10 (worst possible pain)
Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Entry Text: Rate your pain level while performing the exercise.

Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Name: Pain Level After Exercise
Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Scale from 0 (no pain) to 10 (worst possible pain)
Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Entry Text: Rate your pain level after completing the exercise.

Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Name: Effort Level
Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Entry Text: Rate how difficult the exercise felt on a scale of 1 (easy) to 5 (hard).

Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Name: Form/Technique
Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Scale indicating the quality of your form, or descriptive notes

Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Name: Modifications (if any)
Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Description of any changes made to the exercise
Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Entry Text: Note any modifications you made to the exercise (e.g., reduced range of motion, using support).

Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Name: Notes/Observations
Rehabilitation Exercise Tracking.Entry Text: Add any other relevant notes about the exercise or how it felt.

Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Name: Date
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Enter the date of the tracking entry.

Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Name: Target Habit
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: The specific bad habit you are working on breaking
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Clearly identify the bad habit you are tracking (e.g., nail biting, excessive phone use, smoking).

Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Name: Triggers
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units: Text, Dropdown (e.g., Stress, Boredom, Specific Times, Locations, People)
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Situations, emotions, or cues that lead to the habit
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Note any triggers that preceded the urge or the occurrence of the habit.

Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Name: Urge Level (if applicable)
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Rating of the intensity of the urge to perform the habit
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Entry Text: If you experienced an urge, rate its intensity.

Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Name: Occurrence Today?
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Indicate if the habit occurred today, or the number of times
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Did the habit occur today? If yes, how many times?

Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Name: Severity/Duration (if applicable)
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Rating of the severity of the occurrence, or the duration in minutes
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Entry Text: If the habit occurred, rate its severity or record its duration.

Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Name: Strategies Used
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units: Text, Checkbox (e.g., Avoid Triggers, Replacement Behavior, Mindfulness)
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Techniques you used to resist the habit
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Note any strategies you consciously employed to avoid or resist the habit.

Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Name: Success in Resisting Urge?
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Indicate if you were successful in resisting the urge
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Were you successful in resisting the urge to perform the habit?

Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Name: Feelings After Occurrence
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units: Text, Dropdown (e.g., Guilt, Shame, Relief, Neutral)
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Emotions experienced after the habit occurred
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Describe how you felt after the habit occurred.

Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Name: Progress Today
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Your overall assessment of your progress today
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Rate your overall progress in breaking the habit today or describe any significant changes.

Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Name: Learnings/Insights
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Any new understandings about your triggers or the habit
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Note any new things you learned about your triggers, urges, or the habit itself.

Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Name: Support Received (if any)
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Any support you received from others
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Note any support you received from friends, family, or support groups.

Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Name: Notes/Observations
Breaking Bad Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Add any other relevant notes about your experience today.

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Date
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Enter the date of the tracking entry.

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Target Habit
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: The specific good habit you are working on starting
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Clearly identify the good habit you are tracking (e.g., daily meditation, regular exercise, reading every day).

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Why This Habit?
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Your reasons and motivations for starting this habit
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Briefly explain why you want to start this habit and what benefits you expect.

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Desired Frequency
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units: e.g., Daily, 3 times/week, Once a week
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: How often you aim to perform this habit
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Entry Text: State your goal for how often you want to do this habit.

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Current Frequency (Initial)
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: How often you currently perform this habit
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Note your current frequency of performing this habit before actively trying to start it.

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Strategies Used Today
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units: Text, Checkbox (e.g., Setting Reminders, Pairing with Existing Habit, Visual Cues)
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Techniques you used to try and perform the habit today
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Note any specific strategies you used today to help you do the habit.

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Success Today?
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Indicate if you successfully performed the habit today
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Did you successfully perform the target habit today?

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Enjoyment Level
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Rating of how much you enjoyed performing the habit
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Rate how enjoyable it was to do the habit today.

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Difficulty Level
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Rating of how difficult it was to perform the habit
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Rate how difficult it was to do the habit today.

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Progress Today
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Your overall assessment of your progress in establishing the habit today
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Rate your overall progress in establishing the habit today or describe any significant steps.

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Obstacles/Challenges
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Any difficulties or roadblocks you encountered
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Note any obstacles or challenges that made it difficult to do the habit.

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Learnings/Insights
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Any new understandings about what helps or hinders the habit formation
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Note any new things you learned about what helps you stick to the habit or what makes it difficult.

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Support Received (if any)
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Any support you received from others
Starting Good Habits Tracking.Entry Text: Note any support you received from friends, family, or resources.

Starting Good Habits Tracking.Name: Notes/Observations

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Date
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Enter the date of the moment.

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Time of Day
ADHD Moment Tracking.Common Units: HH:MM (24-hour format), Morning, Afternoon, Evening, Night
ADHD Moment Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Specific time or general time period
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Note the time of day when the moment occurred.

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Situation/Context
ADHD Moment Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Description of the environment and what was happening
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Describe the situation or context in which the ADHD moment occurred.

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Trigger (if known)
ADHD Moment Tracking.Common Units: Text, Dropdown (e.g., Noise, Stress, Boredom, Specific Task)
ADHD Moment Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Any identifiable trigger that may have contributed
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Note any potential triggers that preceded the moment.

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Description of ADHD Moment
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Describe the specific thoughts, feelings, or behaviors you experienced.

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Hyperfocus?
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Did you experience intense focus on one thing to the exclusion of others?

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Impulsivity?
ADHD Moment Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Indicate if impulsivity was present, and describe it
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Did you act without thinking? If yes, briefly describe the impulsive behavior.

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Inattention?
ADHD Moment Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Indicate if inattention was prominent, and describe it
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Did you struggle to focus or stay on task? If yes, briefly describe the inattention.

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Hyperactivity?
ADHD Moment Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Indicate if physical restlessness was present, and describe it
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Did you feel overly restless or fidgety? If yes, briefly describe the hyperactivity.

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Emotional Dysregulation?
ADHD Moment Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Indicate if emotions felt overwhelming or disproportionate, and describe it
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Did you experience intense or difficult-to-manage emotions? If yes, briefly describe them.

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Strategies Used (if any)
ADHD Moment Tracking.Common Units: Text, Checkbox (e.g., Deep breathing, Task switching, Medication)
ADHD Moment Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Any coping mechanisms or strategies you employed
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Note any strategies you used to manage the situation.

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Success of Strategies
ADHD Moment Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Rating of how well the strategies worked
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Rate how effective your strategies were in managing the moment.

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Impact/Consequences
ADHD Moment Tracking.Common Units Full Name: The result or outcome of the moment
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Note any impact or consequences of the ADHD moment.

ADHD Moment Tracking.Name: Notes/Observations
ADHD Moment Tracking.Entry Text: Add any other relevant notes about the experience.

Resources.Name: NIMH - Health Topics
Resources.Summary: National Institute of Mental Health resources on mental disorders, including ADHD, and related behavioral topics.

Resources.Summary: National resource center providing support, education, and advocacy for individuals with ADHD.

Medication Tracking.Name: Medication Name

Medication Tracking.Common Units Full Name: How often the medication is taken

Medication Tracking.Name: Last Filled Date

Medication Tracking.Entry Text: Estimate or calculate the date you'll need to refill this medication.

Medication Tracking.Entry Text: Note any side effects you believe are related to this medication.

Medication Tracking.Name: Side Effect Start Date (if applicable)

Medication Tracking.Name: Notes/Observations

Common Health Ailments.Name: Systolic Blood Pressure
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Record the top number of your blood pressure reading.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Diastolic Blood Pressure
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Record the bottom number of your blood pressure reading.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Heart Rate
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Count your pulse or use a heart rate monitor and enter the value in beats per minute.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Blood Glucose
Common Health Ailments.Common Units Full Name: milligrams per deciliter, millimoles per liter
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Record your blood glucose level as measured by your glucometer. Specify the units.

Common Health Ailments.Name: HbA1c
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Record your most recent HbA1c test result.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Weight
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Weigh yourself using a scale and enter the value in kilograms or pounds.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Body Mass Index
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: BMI is automatically calculated from height and weight.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Waist Circumference
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Measure around your natural waistline and record the measurement. Specify the units.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Mood
Common Health Ailments.Common Units Full Name: Scale from 1 to 10, Descriptive words (e.g., happy, sad, anxious)
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Rate your overall mood on a scale of 1 to 10, or briefly describe how you are feeling.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Anxiety Level
Common Health Ailments.Common Units Full Name: Scale from 1 to 10, Descriptive words (e.g., calm, worried, panicky)
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Rate your current level of anxiety on a scale of 1 to 10, or briefly describe your anxiety.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Pain Level
Common Health Ailments.Common Units Full Name: Scale from 0 (no pain) to 10 (worst possible pain)
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Rate your current pain level on a scale of 0 to 10.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Joint Swelling
Common Health Ailments.Common Units Full Name: Yes or No, Specific joint location
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Indicate if you have any joint swelling and, if so, specify the location(s).

Common Health Ailments.Name: Fatigue Level
Common Health Ailments.Common Units Full Name: Scale from 1 (no fatigue) to 10 (severe fatigue), Descriptive words (e.g., energetic, tired, exhausted)
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Rate your current level of fatigue on a scale of 1 to 10, or briefly describe your fatigue.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Medication Adherence
Common Health Ailments.Common Units Full Name: Yes or No (took all prescribed medications), Percentage of doses taken
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Indicate if you took all your prescribed medications today, or record the percentage of doses taken.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Asthma Symptoms
Common Health Ailments.Common Units Full Name: Descriptive words (e.g., wheezing, coughing, shortness of breath)
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Describe any asthma symptoms you are experiencing.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Peak Expiratory Flow
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Record your peak expiratory flow reading.

Common Health Ailments.Name: COPD Symptoms
Common Health Ailments.Common Units Full Name: Descriptive words (e.g., breathlessness, mucus production, chest tightness)
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Describe any COPD symptoms you are experiencing.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Oxygen Saturation
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Use a pulse oximeter and enter the oxygen saturation percentage.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Height
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Measure your height using a tape measure or wall scale and enter the value in centimeters or feet and inches.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Body Temperature
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Use a digital thermometer and enter your body temperature in degrees Celsius or Fahrenheit.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Respiratory Rate
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Count your breaths for one minute and enter the total.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Blood Pressure
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Use a home blood pressure monitor and enter systolic/diastolic pressure in mmHg.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Steps
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Enter the total number of steps taken today from a pedometer or fitness app.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Distance
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Enter the distance walked or run in kilometers or miles from a fitness app or GPS tracker.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Active Minutes
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Enter the total active minutes recorded during the day.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Calories Burned
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Enter the number of kilocalories burned from your fitness tracker or estimate.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Sleep Duration
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Enter the total number of hours you slept last night.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Urine Color
Common Health Ailments.Common Units Full Name: a color chart scale (pale yellow to dark amber)
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Compare your urine color to a hydration color chart and select the closest match.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Urine Volume
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Measure the amount of urine using a marked container and enter in mL or liters.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Bowel Movements
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Enter the number of bowel movements you had today.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Sleep Quality
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Rate your sleep quality using a score from 1 to 10 or as Good, Fair, Poor.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Heart Rate Variability
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Enter your HRV value in milliseconds from a fitness tracker or monitoring device.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Breathing Patterns
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Record abnormal breathing events per hour, typically from a sleep tracker.

Common Health Ailments.Name: Skin Irritation Level
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Rate any skin irritation from 0 (none) to 5 (severe).

Common Health Ailments.Name: Stomach Sensitivity
Common Health Ailments.Entry Text: Rate your stomach sensitivity or discomfort from 0 (none) to 5 (very sensitive).

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Date
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Enter the date of your sleep.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Time to Bed
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Enter the time you went to bed.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Wake-up Time
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Enter the time you woke up.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Total Sleep Time
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Record the total duration of your sleep.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Record your AHI as reported by your sleep study or device.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Oxygen Saturation (Lowest)
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Record the lowest oxygen saturation level reached during sleep.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Oxygen Desaturation Events (ODI)
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Number of oxygen desaturation events per hour of sleep
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Record the Oxygen Desaturation Index from your sleep data.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Snoring (Intensity/Frequency)

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Rating of snoring intensity and description of frequency
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Rate the intensity of your snoring and describe how often it occurred.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Sleep Position
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Note the position you slept in most often.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Sleep Stages (from tracker/study)
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Duration of each sleep stage in minutes
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Record the duration of Deep, REM, and Light sleep stages if available.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Number of Awakenings
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Number of times you woke up during the night

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Sleep Efficiency (from tracker/study)
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Percentage of time spent asleep while in bed
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Record your sleep efficiency percentage if available.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Sleep Latency
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Time taken to fall asleep in minutes
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Estimate or record how long it took you to fall asleep.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Number of RERAs per hour of sleep
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Record the RERA index if reported by your sleep study or device.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Heart Rate (Average)
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Record your average heart rate during sleep if available.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Heart Rate (Lowest)
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Lowest heart rate recorded during sleep
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Record your lowest heart rate during sleep if available.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Common Units: Checkbox (Headache, Dry Mouth, Fatigue, Other), Text
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Check applicable symptoms or describe others
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Indicate any symptoms you experienced upon waking or describe them.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Medications/Devices Used
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Common Units: Checkbox (CPAP, APAP, Oral Appliance, Other), Text
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Check devices/medications used or describe others
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Indicate any devices or medications used to manage sleep apnea or snoring, or describe others.

Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Name: Notes/Observations
Sleep Apnea and Snoring Tracking.Entry Text: Add any other relevant notes about your sleep, snoring, or apnea.

Persistent Cough Tracking.Name: Date

Persistent Cough Tracking.Common Units: e.g., Occasional, Frequent, Constant, Number of bouts

Persistent Cough Tracking.Entry Text: Describe the type of cough you have.

Persistent Cough Tracking.Common Units: Text, Checkbox (e.g., Cold air, Allergens, Exercise, Talking)

Persistent Cough Tracking.Entry Text: Note anything that seems to provide relief from your cough.

Persistent Cough Tracking.Common Units: Checkbox (Sore throat, Runny nose, Fever, Chest pain, Shortness of breath)

Persistent Cough Tracking.Common Units: Text (e.g., Cough syrup, Lozenges, Home remedies)
Persistent Cough Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Any medications or treatments you are using for the cough
Persistent Cough Tracking.Entry Text: Note any medications or treatments you are using.

Persistent Cough Tracking.Name: Effectiveness of Treatment
Persistent Cough Tracking.Common Units Full Name: Rating of how well the treatment seems to be working
Persistent Cough Tracking.Entry Text: Rate how effective your current treatment seems to be.

Persistent Cough Tracking.Name: Impact on Daily Activities

Persistent Cough Tracking.Common Units Full Name: How much the cough is affecting your daily life
Persistent Cough Tracking.Entry Text: Rate how much your cough is affecting your daily activities or describe the impact.

Persistent Cough Tracking.Name: Sleep Quality (related to cough)
Persistent Cough Tracking.Common Units Full Name: How the cough is affecting your sleep quality
Persistent Cough Tracking.Entry Text: Rate the quality of your sleep in relation to your cough.

Persistent Cough Tracking.Name: Notes/Observations
Persistent Cough Tracking.Entry Text: Add any other relevant notes about your cough.

Urethral Stricture.Entry Text: Record your approximate daily fluid intake. Specify the units.

Urethral Stricture.Entry Text: Rate your overall sense of well-being as it relates to your urinary issues.
